definition: how about it?/what do you think?
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
as/as if/such as
surname He
what/how/why/which/carry

sentences.english: How do you think the instant-boiled mutton?
sentences.chinese: 咱們去喫涮羊肉，你們意下如何？

sentences.english: The day necessarily will become a pillars just, don't know two how under the idea?
sentences.chinese: 日必將成爲棟樑之才，不知二位意下如何？

sentences.english: How about going to listen to a rock concert tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上去聽搖滾音樂意下如何？

sentences.english: Let's chat in English, what do you two think of the idea?
sentences.chinese: 這樣吧，我們以後改用英語聊天，二位意下如何？

sentences.english: My lord of Burgundy, what say you to the lady?
sentences.chinese: 勃艮第公爵，您對於這位公主意下如何？

sentences.english: The profit from this million will often be mine. Would you mind?
sentences.chinese: 這一百萬賺得錢歸我，你意下如何？

sentences.english: The profit from this million will be mine. Would you mind?
sentences.chinese: 這一百萬賺得錢歸我，你意下如何？

sentences.english: What do you say to going to a cinema tonight?
sentences.chinese: 今晚去看電影你意下如何？

definition: is it possible or not?
I have been enlightened by your teaching (humble)
lit. your honored carriage/your highness/honored Sir (also sarcastic)/you
(honorific) your respected opinion/What do you think, your majesty?
(pron) everyone/Ladies and Gentlemen/Sirs
(polite) your business/what brings you?
worthy little brother
to do sb the honor (of attending etc)/to put in an appearance/to show up
(polite) do me the honor
(polite) thank you for your trouble (used when asking a favor or after having received one)
not as good as/not equal to/inferior
there is no harm in saying what one thinks (idiom)
why not?/why not do (sth)?
Your esteemed father (honorific)
son of an official/son of nobility/your son (honorific)
